login.emailResetSent: An email allowing you to reset your password has been sent to you.
login.emailResetSentOther: An email allowing the user to reset his password has been sent.
login.tokenNotFound: Sorry, unable to find your token, we can not validate your request.

first_connection.title: First connection
first_connection.hasAlreadyPassword: Can not update. This user already has a password.
first_connection.userNotExist: This user does not exist, please check that the login and email are correct.
first_connection.passwordNotValid: The password is not valid, please try again.
first_connection.userNotActivate: Your account is not activated, please do the first login procedure.
first_connection.missingToken: The first connection token is missing, please check your email.
first_connection.wrongToken: The first connection token is invalid.

help.email_content:
For the admin account:
Local environment:admin@local.fr
Online environment:VOTRE_ENV-admin@nodea.com
(example: https://myenv.nodea.studio => myenv-admin@nodea-software.com)

For other accounts:
Email of your choice, this email will be used for the gitlab account associated with the generator if applicable.
help.password_content:
Please choose your password, it must respect the following format:

- 8 characters minimum
- At least 1 digit
- At least 1 capital letter
- At least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*)

login.authentication: Sign in to start your session
login.login_fail: The login and / or password is not correct, please try again.
login.logout_success: You have been successfully logged out.

button.confirm: Are you sure you want to continue ?

home.website_text: Visit our website to learn more about Nodea.

error.fkValueTooLong: Sorry, the value provided for the foreign key exceeds the maximum allowed length (<=60) after generation (%s). Please try to give more compact instructions, you can later change the translations for the display.

chat.welcome:
Hello and welcome ! I'm Nodea, your personnal creation assistant. At any time, I am here to help you discover the Nodea generator.
To get started, here are few instructions that you can run below:

- add entity Person
- add field Name
- add field Birthday with type date

If you are logged out, no worry ! You can:
- Restart

The node module '%s' is missing ! You can install it with the instruction:

A new tab ¬´%s¬ª has been created on the entity %s.

You can use this tab by showing the entity %s.

action.no_access_admin: You have to be an administrator to access this page.

home.1:
Welcome to Nodea!
To start, I will present the different menus to you.
home.2: Here is the Build menu. Through this menu you can generate and manage your Nodea applications!
home.3: In the Develop menu you will find a follow-up of the activities as well as the interactions with the source code manager of the generator.
home.4: The Test menu will allow you to set up testing and validation phases for your generated applications! It is currently under development.
home.5: In this menu you will find the interface for preparing and organizing the deployment of your applications. It is currently under development.
home.6: The Configure menu allows you to customize your Nodea generator as well as to administer your account.

build.1: Here you can create a standard application ready to be customized!
build.2: Here you can write a script or load an instruction file to generate a complete application in a few minutes!
build.3: If you have an already existing application on another Nodea generator, you can import it here!
build.4: You can consult all the applications here, and thus export them, clone the source code or even delete them.
build.5: Here you will find quick access to all your applications!

preview.1: Welcome to the preview page of your application! I will explain the various elements currently in front of you.
preview.2: In this area is your application, it is currently usable and you can already navigate in it to try it!
preview.3: Here you can type instructions to modify your application. Try 'Add Person Entity' for example!
preview.4: Once an instruction has been executed, I will answer you here :) I will give you some tips from time to time!
preview.5: The session allows you to know on which Application, which module and which entity you are currently on! It is important to know on which elements will apply your instructions.
preview.6: You have some action and quick access buttons available here.
preview.7: The UI Editor allows you to modify the order and the width of your fields!
preview.8: Here you can access an online code editor that provides the current application code!
preview.9: The logs allow you to display the feedback from your application, useful to understand what is going on!

develop.1: Welcome to the Develop menu! Here you will find information about the source code manager connected to the generator (ex Gitlab).
develop.2: You can choose the application you want to view here.
develop.3: Here are the last commits made on the repository of your application.
develop.4: You find in Tasks all the issues coming from the source code manager.
develop.5: Here you will find the tasks assigned to you.
develop.6: The different versions of the application will be listed here
develop.7: Developer documentation as well as API documentation can be accessed here!

error.project_creation: An error occured during the project creation on the code platform.
error.user_not_in_session: Unable to find your platform code user in session. Please try to disconnect / reconnect or contact the platform administrator.
error.user_not_found: Cannot find user on code platform. Please contact code platform administrator in order to create your account.
error.admin_not_confirmed: The generator administrator has not confirmed his Gitlab account, please contact him!
error.user_not_confirmed: You have not confirmed your Gitlab account, please check your email before continuing!

alpha.text:
Be aware that this version is still in development, if you find a bug or have a suggestion you can participate to our official Github or contact us on:

support@nodea-software.com

Thank you !

demo.feature_not_available: This feature is not available in demo mode, you can signup to unlock it !
demo.hello_there: Hello there, welcome to Nodea! We will generate your application in a few moments üëç
demo.please_wait: It won't take long, really not long, usually no more than 30 seconds!
demo.oups_queue: Oops there are already curious people in front of you! Don't worry you are %cptth in the queue.

modal.title: Nodea demo mode
modal.text2: You are currently on a demo environment allowing you to simply try the management application generation with Nodea.
modal.text3: I invite you to follow the tutorial popups to familiarize yourself with the interface and the concept of instructions.
modal.text4: If you have any questions you can go to our documentation:
modal.text5: Or join our Discord where we will do our best to answer you as soon as possible:

expire_modal.title: Your app expired
expire_modal.text1: In Nodea's demonstration mode your applications have an expiration time of 7 days.
expire_modal.text2: After this time your session and your applications will be deleted.
expire_modal.text3: If you wish to keep your applications, we invite you to register in order to access your Nodea environment!

instructions_modal.title: Congratulations!
instructions_modal.text3: If you want to learn more about the instructions you can find them all on our documentation:
instructions_modal.text4: Also if you have any questions feel free to join our Discord:
instructions_modal.text5: Finally, if you want to privatize, keep and access the code of your generated applications, I invite you to generate today < b>your private environment!
